Vue-Ahead

An auto-complete control for VueJS framework

Get Started →

Written in Nattive Vue

The control is written in classic VueJS, and exported as a standalone Javascript library. It can be imbedded into any VueJS application, or used as a standalone web control with the support of the VueJS runtime.

Auto-Complete Control

The control let users to select one or multiple options from a predefined or a hot loaded option list. The default search engine will match strings presented in the listed options.

Replacing TypeAhead

The control is designed in mind of the TypeAhead library, which serves as the default auto-complete jQuery plugin for the IASTATE WebDev team. The control provides all the features offered by the plugin, plus bonus improvments and features.
